bibl.title: A Greek Winery for Sale in a Fayum Demotic Papyrus.
The Two Faces of Graeco-Roman Egypt. Greek and Demotic and Greek-Demotic Texts and Studies Presented to P.W. Pestman
bibl.author: VANDORPE, Katelijn

bibl.note: Subscriptions in Greek. The sale concerns immovables in the Arsinoite village of Sebennytos, ca. 107-30 B.C.
bibl.seg: VANDORPE Katelijn and Willy CLARYSSE, A Greek Winery for Sale in a Fayum Demotic Papyrus.

A.M.F.W. VERHOOGT and S.P. VLEEMING (Edd.), The Two Faces of Graeco-Roman Egypt. Greek and Demotic and Greek-Demotic Texts and Studies Presented to P.W. Pestman = Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. XXX (Leiden, 1998) pp. 127-139, tabl. et pll. VI-VIII.
